column4: Can someone explain to me how the weather feature works in Evolution in the calendar, I already found my city and selected it but now what?
after you select your city, then restart evolution and then look at your calendar, at the top of each day youll have a temp range and a conditions forecast
nope, dont see anything, will it show it on the full month view?
no just for the next week, and you have to  be in day mode, click on the box by the weather calendar
yeah im in day mode, still dont see it, wierd

Mantice,: I just got done installing Win Xp on a box here at home to do online banking, it took 6 hours between install and updates, installing av and everything else, meanwhile I made 4 vm on another box and upgraded thenm all
Arafangiln: yes, actually my linuxphobe wife needed ti
Arafangiln: Portland Federal Credit Union and SeaFirst bank
could you take a screenshot of what your talking about?
Arafangiln: actually the machine did not come with XP, it came out of the junk pile at the computer store by my house and the XP came from Emule

I dont have evolution, I use Sylpheed and Claws, but I tried it before I dumped it. But if you go to calendar, you will see on the right side a list of cal's, personal, birthdays and weather, check the box by weather and make sure personal is checked then got to day veiw, look at tomorrow and see the top of the day, the weather should be there
in day view, you say look @ tomorrow
and personal and weather are checked
lemme show you what i have
TiG4:on the month view on the right side, click the next day
